snippet.title: Dude Simulator 3 ~ Just Doing Dude Things
snippet.description:
We're just an average dude that wants to bring his buddy a present. But things seem to keep getting in the way of that as we head down the road causing all kinds of problems along the way...

After another attempt off recording, still no clue what to do in prison so this is going to probably be a one off for now, maybe back when the games a bit more polished.





Dude Simulator 3 is an open world sandbox game. It is your friend’s birthday tomorrow. You have already bought him a present, now you only have to give it to him. But your friends lives in another city, quite far from you.

Link to Steam Store Page ~ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1086640/Dude_Simulator_3/

#dudesimulator3
